thread.section_title: Viceroy Central Park New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Gem of a small hotel!
thread.title_full: Gem of a small hotel! - Review of Viceroy Central Park New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Larry L
title: Gem of a small hotel!
text: Lovely time here. Staff are outstandingly helpful and friendly. Rooms are rather small but beautifully decorated and equipped. Deal price was quite modest. It is conveniently located in Mid-town, steps from Carnegie Hall (and Subway) and south Central Park. Would very gladly return!
